welcome_message_body: Welcome to San Miguel, Philippines! Get ready to be enchanted by our city's vibrant culture, stunning beaches, and delicious cuisine. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring everything our charming city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Baler Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the terminal building.
